name: Maze Hunter
description:
I made a game in processing called maze hunter, for the final project of my grade 11 computer science class. The goal is to locate all of the gems in the level without being caught by the zombie that chases you, featuring 10 levels, multiplayer mode, powerups, a basic level editor, and a hidden easter egg.

Honestly its not a great game and I don't recommend playing it for longer than 15 minutes, I wasn't a great programmer when I made it and it kinda shows
